name: Ashen Memory
description:
You and your friends are on a dream vacation in Tokyo, when they get a bright idea for an even more daring adventure...and you get dragged along.

You're technically not supposed to be out this far from the city, but...what's the harm, right? 

あっ、もし分かったら。。。

私のきれいな皿。。。返して。

ありがとう。。。ふふふふ。。。

An RPG Maker MV game based off of the capabilities of the MSX computer.
